attributes.action: Give people the choose to sit whenever they want in class.
attributes.additional_details: Make it a law, and imprison any teachers that disobey.
attributes.background: Force teachers to give us our human right of freedom of movement and let the us sit whenever we want in class.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about seating plans are a matter for schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
